The user creates a swamp by changing the ground beneath a target into mud, which the target sinks into. The mud is infused with [[chakra]] to make it sticky, ensnaring the target and preventing escape. The size and depth of the swamp are determined by the user's skill and the amount of chakra used; ideally it will be made large enough for targets to become completely submerged. It is most effective when used against multiple and/or particularly large targets.<ref name="d2"/>

This technique is not restricted to usage on the ground, as it can also be used to capture enemies clinging to ceilings, who will sink into it regardless.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 378, page 16</ref>
